name: project-books_management
description: It is a project that focuses on managing books and their reviews. It provides a set of APIs to perform various operations related to users, books, and reviews.  Models User Model     {   title: {string, mandatory, enum[Mr, Mrs, Miss]},   name: {string, mandatory},   phone: {string, mandatory, unique},   email: {string, mandatory, valid email, unique},    password: {string, mandatory, minLen 8, maxLen 15},   address: {     street: {string},     city: {string},     pincode: {string}   },   createdAt: {timestamp},   updatedAt: {timestamp} }
